intrContent: Open treasure case can randomly get a NFT with normal, good, or outstanding attributes.Space Ball players get SBL rewards by staking NFTs, and the amount of SBL is determined based on the rarity and star rating of the NFTs. NFTs can be transacted in the market within the Space Ball ecosystem and also support transacting on third-party NFT platforms.

NFT Pledge sub: Stake the NFT on the Space Ball platform contract to get reward
IGO Release sub: The first to launch the IGO mechanism in the same type of subject
NFT Evolve sub: Introducing a evolving mechanism, players can evolve low-value NFT into high-value NFT
NFT Transaction sub: Can be transacted in third-party platforms and Space Ball NFT markets
Guess entertainment sub: Space Ball focuses on attracting players in different fields
Game ecology sub: The games base on block chain allow players to own and disposal their game assets forever
total supply: The token total supply is 200 million,and it will continue to burn its supply through the donation fund
nodeInte1: The token SBL in Space Ball is minted by donation and governance of the economic model, bringing greater rights and benefits to the ecological coin minting nodes. Players burn SBL to obtain 200% of the annualized BNB income. The ecological minting node is the only one that has the number of burned SBL to carry out proportional minting of SBL.
nodeInte2: The rights and interests of the number of minted SBL obtained by the ecological coin minting nodes are different in each period. The higher the price of SBL, the less and less the number of SBL minted by the ecological minting node.
Road Map sub title 1: April:The SpaceBall concept was born, a feasibility study of its concept
Road Map sub title 3: March:The metaverse route extends again: increases gaming, social, ID identity
Road Map sub title 4: April:NFT purchases within SpaceBall, trading testing
Road Map subtitle 4: May:In-game NFT purchases, transactions are completed, and the IGO phase is entered at the end of the month
Road Map sub title 5: NFT card pledge reward open NFT trading platform officially launched SBL minting and destruction open
Road Map sub title 6: NFT casting opened, entertainment even guessed online
Road Map sub title 11: SpaceBall route extension, planning new design routes, studying feasibility
Road Map sub title 12: SpaceBall new route technology development: improve NFT transactions, ID identity creation
Road Map sub title 13: SpaceBall new route technology development: optimize ID identity, create social, entertainment, office integration
Road Map subtitle 13: SpaceBall virtual reality, join vr device access. Build the SpaceBall Club and create the top tournaments. The SpaceBall Prize Cup was established
node Rules1: 1、Hold a common NFT cards and have a one-star burn SBL amount for casting, casting ratio: 12%
node Rules2: 2、Hold a uncommon NFT card, and have a two-star burn SBL amount for casting. The casting ratio: 8%
node Rules3: 3、Hold a outstanding NFT land, own the casting rights of the newly destroyed amount in the sports center, the casting ratio, the newly burned SBL: 3%; the new casting income of the same quality NFT land: 3%
node Rules4: 4、Hold a rare NFT cards, owns the casting rights of the newly burned amount in their own sports center, the casting ratio, the newly burned SBL: 6%; the new casting income of the same quality NFT land: 5%
node Rules5: 5、Hold a perfect NFT cards have the casting rights of the newly burned amount in their own sports center, the casting ratio, the newly burned SBL: 8%; the new casting income of the same quality NFT land: 10%
node Rules6: 6、Hold a epic NFT cards, and have the casting rights of the newly burned amount in the sports center. The casting ratio, the newly burned SBL: 12%; the new casting income of the same quality NFT land: 15%
node Rules7: 7、Hold a legendary NFT card, and have the casting rights of the newly burned amount in the sports center, the casting ratio, the newly burned SBL: 13%; the new casting income of the same quality NFT land: 25%
RefundContebt: Within 90 days, if the minting of 20% of the node's coinage quota is not completed, 80% of the BNB (4BNB) of the subscription node will be refunded, and the minting node's 80% SBL quota will be destroyed, and 20% of the SBL node's coinage rights will be retained. Continue to mint by inviting burn and burning SBL in your own sports center
Game reward token message: SBL is Space Ball's native governance token, which combines decentralized finance(DeFi), DAO and NFT, a metaverse economy created on the Binance Smart Chain. SBL is an open source protocol whose rules are executed by intelligent contracts, and SBL is a BEP20 token that endows the holder the SBL governance rights.
bannertips1: Space Ball is a metaverse firstly created in the theme of sports. People in the Space Ball metaverse can transact their own NFT, participate in sports guessing, sports competitive games, asset trading, build your own virtual social network and meet more friends.
bannertips2: Space Ball is created and introduced with the real world sports concepts in five panels such as NFT transaction, sports guessing, deep game playing,  asset trading, and social networking, to create more real metaverse space immersion experience, and build a metaverse with the theme of exercises and sports.
SPACE BALL: SPACE BALL  The first community-driven metaverse platform with sports themes
Mystery cases: Mystery cases are valuable blind boxes in the Space Ball ecosystem. When you open the mystery case, you will get badge NFTs. Badge NFTs are an important asset in the Space Ball ecosystem, and are also an entry qualification requirement for many application ecosystems. NFT cards from the mystery case can be transacted on the Market or on the decentralized NFT platform; in the IGO stage, BNB are used to purchase, and SBL needs to be used after SBL goes online.
Freely transact: Freely transact NFTs in the market and third-party platforms
Freely: Freely transact NFTs in the market and third-party platforms
Reduce: Reduce SBL total supply and increase the value
Staking NF: Staking NFT to get early mining rights
Get more: Get more SBLs and more high-value NFTs
PVP battles: PVP battles，kill Bosses，earn your own honor and reward
Holding the: Holding the badge NFT is a necessary condition for obtaining the invitation reward and activating the ID status NFT. At the same time, the badge is also the family symbol of different races and planets, and plays an important role in the Space Ball games.
jointly build: Holding the badge NFT and adding liquidity can activate the ID identity NFT, obtain land, enjoy the rights and interests of land income, and jointly build a sports financial center.
Space Ball adopts a: Space Ball adopts a dual-token system, in which SBL (Space Ball) is an ecological governance token, and MBA (Meta Ball) is a game incentive token. MBA is a game token with a destruction mechanism point, with a total supply of 6 billion pieces. Players can use NFTs in the Space Ball game to team up and compete to obtain rights and MBA rewards in the virtual world.
SBL is Space Ball's: SBL is Space Ball's native governance token, which combines decentralized finance(DeFi), DAO and NFT, a metaverse economy created on the Binance Smart Chain. SBL is an open source protocol whose rules are executed by intelligent contracts, and SBL is a BEP20 token that endows the holder the SBL governance rights，the initial supply is 200 million,and it will continue to burn its supply through the donation fund.
PriceDesc: The price of cases increases by 3% from the original base each 60000 blocks
NodeDesc: Eco-coinage is to use the total amount of SBL burned by all players in the coinage node community to proportionally coinage and unlock the SBL tokens in the rights and interests of the ecological coinage node. Become a coinage node and get 200% BNB annualized income for 90 days.The rights and interests of the number of coined SBLs obtained by the ecological coinage nodes are different in each period. The higher the price of SBL, the less and less the number of SBL coined by the ecological coinage node.
